publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-473 Mike Watson: Budget (Scotland) Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Finance Committee considers the Budget (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order in which the provisions arise in the Bill except that each schedule be considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-473 Mike Watson: Budget (Scotland) Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Parliament considers the Budget (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order in which the provisions arise in the Bill except that each schedule be considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
